item.title: Guitar online lesson for abusolute beginners
item.dc:creator: Bianka
item.description:
This course is made for beginners, you will learn basics of gutiar playing, essential chords and strumming techniques to understand music theory. After this course you will have all the basics and be ready to start playing on your own.
After you purchase this online lesson you will recieve an e-mail with the online lesson modules.
item.content:encoded:
• Welcome to Introduction to Guitar
    • Welcome to Music Mania online guitar lessons! Before you begin the course, we will cover all the details about the course and what you’ll need to know to get the most out of your Online course.
  • Acoustic / Electric Guitar and the Basics
    • In this first lesson, we will take things slow. We will focus on how to choose the right guitar for you and what accessories are essential for any guitar player. We’ll also learn the parts of the guitar and get you comfortable with your instrument.
  • Getting Started: Fundamental Guitar Skills
    • In this lesson, you will learn how to tune and you will start playing your instrument from the ground up! Be patient and remember: focus on being accurate and play in consistent time with your metronome. These things are far more important than playing with speed.
  • The Twelve Half Steps and Basic Notation
    • While you don’t need to be an expert on music theory to play guitar, it is important to know the basic building blocks of music. With this understanding, music will no longer be shrouded in mystery or complexity. This lesson presents fundamental musical ideas in a fun, non-intimidating way.
  • Scales: Construction and Fingerings
    • In this lesson, you will dig into scales. Don’t be intimidated. Some of you may have heard of, or practiced, scales. It might have been during piano lessons. Most likely it wasn’t very exciting for you. Hopefully you’ll find the approach to scales in lesson 4 much easier and even fun.
  • Chords: Building Easy Triads and Power Chords
    • In this lesson, you will use all of the skills you’ve gained from the previous lessons to build the foundation of harmony. You will play certain scale notes at the same time to create chords. Let’s look at why chords sound like they do, how to build them, how to easily play chords in open position, and how to play chords that you can move all around the neck.
  • Putting it All Together: The Pentatonic Scale and Songs
    • Now that you have the “science” of the guitar in your fingers, you will learn a couple of songs. You will do this by using melody (from the scales) and harmony (from the chords) we have learned. You will also learn an essential scale for playing melodies and soloing.

item.title: [Rental] Fender Telecaster Electric Guitar
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Iconic solid-body electric guitar known for its timeless design and versatile tone.
item.content:encoded:
The Fender Telecaster is a legendary instrument celebrated for its simplicity, durability, and unmistakable sound. With its solid ash or alder body, bolt-on maple neck, and single-coil pickups, the Telecaster delivers a distinctive twangy tone that’s been heard on countless recordings across various genres. Whether you’re playing country, rock, blues, or beyond, the Telecaster offers timeless style and unmatched playability.

  • Body: Alder
  • Maple neck
  • Fretboard: Maple
  • Matte neck finish
  • 22 Frets
  • Nut width: 42 mm
  • Scale: 648 mm
  • Pickups: 2 New Player AlNiCo V single coils
  • Volume knob and tone knob
  • 3-Way toggle switch
  • Standard sealed machine heads
  • Ex-factory stringing: Fender .009 – .042
  • Colour: Tidepool

item.title: [Rental] Yamaha Stage Custom Birch Drum Set
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: High-quality drum set with birch shells for superior tone and projection.
item.content:encoded:
The Yamaha Stage Custom Birch drum set is a versatile and reliable instrument suitable for players of all levels. Featuring 100% birch shells, this drum set delivers a rich, focused sound with enhanced projection and sustain. With its durable hardware, professional finish options, and customizable configuration, the Stage Custom Birch is ideal for stage performance, studio recording, and practice sessions.

  • Stage Custom Series
  • High gloss lacquered 6-ply birch wood shells
  • Colour: Raven Black
  • Chrome hardware
  • Y.E.S.S. tom mount system
  • Absolute lugs
  • Steel hoops
  • Redesigned bass drum feet

Shell set comprises:

  • 22″ x 17″ Bass drum with TH945B double tom holder
  • 10″ x 07″ Tom tom
  • 12″ x 08″ Tom tom
  • 16″ x 15″ Floor tom
  • 14″ x 5.5″ Snare drum

item.title: [Rental] Behringer DeepMind 12 Polyphonic Synthesizer
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Endless creativity. The Behringer DeepMind 12 synthesizer offers a vast array of sounds and intuitive controls, inspiring musicians to explore new sonic territories with ease.
item.content:encoded:
Dive into a world of boundless sonic possibilities with the Behringer DeepMind 12 Polyphonic Synthesizer. Whether you’re a seasoned pro or just starting your musical journey, this powerhouse of a synthesizer is designed to inspire and elevate your sound to new heights.
Featuring 12 voices of pure analog power, the DeepMind 12 offers rich, warm tones that will breathe life into your music. With its extensive modulation options, dual FX engines, and comprehensive control panel, you have the tools to sculpt your sound exactly the way you envision it.
Explore a universe of sound with over 1,000 factory presets, or unleash your creativity and craft your own unique patches from scratch. The intuitive interface makes sound design a breeze, allowing you to focus on your creativity without getting bogged down in technicalities.
Whether you’re performing live or producing in the studio, the DeepMind 12 is built to deliver. Its robust build quality and reliable performance ensure that it will stand up to the demands of any musical environment.
Experience the power of analog synthesis with the Behringer DeepMind 12 Polyphonic Synthesizer. Let your imagination run wild and discover a world of sonic possibilities like never before.

  • 49 Half-weighted full-size keys
  • Velocity sensitive keys with aftertouch
  • 4 FX engines powered by tc electronic and Klark Teknik
  • 24 oscillators – 2 OSCs and LFOs per voice
  • 3 ADSR generators
  • Switchable 2- or 4-pole low-pass filter per voice
  • High-pass filter
  • 8-Channel modulation matrix
  • 32-Step control sequencer
  • Envelope Depth
  • Key tracking
  • Remote controllable via iPad/PC/Mac, USB, MIDI or built-in Wi-Fi
  • 26 Knobs and one switch per function for direct access to all important parameters in real time
  • 1024 Programme memories
  • Built-in and adjustable Wi-Fi client
  • LC display
  • Dimensions (W x D x H): 822 x 257 x 103 mm
  • Weight: 8.4 kg
  • Designed and engineered in the U.K.
  • Suitable optional bag: Art.479789 (not included in delivery)
  • suitable optional case: Art.416352 (not included in delivery)

item.title: Neumann U87 Large-Diaphragm Condenser Microphone
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Studio standard. Unrivaled clarity. The Neumann U87 microphone is a legend in the recording industry, renowned for its pristine sound quality and versatility.
item.content:encoded:
Introducing the Neumann U87 Large-Diaphragm Condenser Microphone – the epitome of audio excellence! Renowned for its pristine sound quality and unmatched versatility, the U87 is a must-have for any serious audio professional. Whether you’re recording vocals, instruments, or podcasts, this microphone delivers unparalleled clarity and warmth, capturing every nuance with precision and finesse. Its legendary design and robust build ensure reliability in any recording environment, from the comfort of your home studio to the grandeur of a professional recording facility. Elevate your sound to the next level with the Neumann U87 – where quality meets perfection.

  • Pressure gradient receiver
  • Polar pattern: omnidirectional, cardioid, figure-of-eight
  • Switchable 10 dB attenuation
  • Nominal impedance 200 Ohm
  • Frequency response 20 – 20,000 Hz
  • Sound pressure level for k < 0.5%: 117 dB (cardioid)
  • Sound pressure level for k < 0.5% with pre-attenuation: 127 dB
  • 48 V phantom powering required
  • Dimensions (diameter x length): 56 x 200 mm
  • Weight: 500 g
  • Colour: Nickel
  • Suitable elastic suspension: art. 125520 (not included)
  • Suitable tripod mount: art. 218556 (not included)

item.title: Sennheiser HD 650 Open-Back Headphones
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Audiophile quality. Supreme comfort. The Sennheiser HD 650 headphones deliver pristine sound and luxurious comfort, perfect for critical listening and long studio sessions.
item.content:encoded: Immerse yourself in a world of pure audio bliss with the Sennheiser HD 650 Open-Back Headphones. Renowned for their exceptional sound quality and comfort, these headphones are a favorite among audiophiles and music professionals alike. The open-back design provides a natural soundstage and spacious stereo imaging, allowing you to hear every detail of your music with stunning clarity and precision. The lightweight aluminum voice coils and neodymium magnets deliver smooth, extended frequency response with deep, tight bass and sparkling highs. With their velour earpads and padded headband, the HD 650 headphones offer hours of listening comfort, making them ideal for critical listening sessions, mixing, mastering, and casual listening alike.

item.title: Nord Stage 3 Digital Piano
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Professional-grade digital piano and synthesizer with versatile performance features.
item.content:encoded:
The Nord Stage 3 digital piano sets the standard for professional keyboard performance with its powerful sound engine, authentic instrument emulations, and intuitive user interface. Featuring Nord’s acclaimed hammer-action keybed, comprehensive effects section, and seamless integration with external gear, the Stage 3 offers unparalleled flexibility and expressiveness for stage and studio use. Whether you’re a pianist, organist, or synthesist, the Nord Stage 3 provides the tools you need to bring your music to life.

  • 88 Weighted keys with Aftertouch
  • Independent sections for piano, organ and synthesizer, each with its own layer mixer and transposition button
  • 2 Programmable scenes (sound setups) with inaudible programme changes
  • Comprehensive piano section with a choice of concert grand, upright and electric pianos
  • 120-Voice polyphony for piano section
  • 2 GB of memory for piano sounds
  • Organ section with 6 models: B3 Tonewheel, B3 Bass, Vox, Farfisa, x2 Pipe
  • LED drawbar, live mode, switchable vibrato/chorus, vintage 122 rotary speaker simulation and adjustable drive
  • Synthesiser section with Nord Wave 2 engine (virtual analogue, samples, FM and digital waves) and 3 layers
  • 48 Voices polyphony for synthesizer section
  • 1 GB memory for Nord Sample Library
  • Expanded arpeggiator with polyphonic, gate and pattern modes
  • Effects section per layer with reverb, delay, 2 modulation effects, compressor, amp simulation and EQ
  • OLED display for program and synth section
  • Wooden pitch-bend handle
  • Modulation wheel
  • Up to 3 split points (up to 4 zones) with LED indicators between zones
  • 4 Assignable audio outputs: 6.3 mm jack
  • Stereo headphone output: 6.3 mm jack
  • Stereo monitor input: 3.5 mm jack
  • Pedal inputs for sustain, expression and swell: 6.3 mm jack
  • Pedal inputs for programme selection and rotor control: 6.3 mm jack
  • MIDI In/Out: 5-pin DIN
  • USB-B port for USB-MIDI, software updates and sound transfer
  • Incl. operating instructions, USB cable and power cord

item.title: Gretsch G5420T Electromatic Hollow Body Electric Guitar
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Classic hollow-body electric guitar with vintage-inspired tone and style.
item.content:encoded:
The Gretsch G5420T Electromatic hollow-body electric guitar captures the essence of Gretsch’s iconic sound and style. Featuring a laminated maple body, dual “Black Top” Filter’Tron pickups, and a Bigsby vibrato tailpiece, this guitar delivers rich, resonant tone with classic Gretsch twang and shimmer. With its elegant design, smooth playability, and versatile sound, the G5420T is perfect for players seeking vintage-inspired tone and aesthetics.

  • Construction: Hollowbody with single cut
  • Body: Maple laminated with trestle block
  • Body depth: 70 mm (2.75″)
  • Maple neck
  • Laurel fretboard
  • Pearloid Neo-Classic thumbnail fretboard inlays
  • Neck profile: Classic “C”
  • Nut width: 42.86 mm (1.6875″)
  • Graph Tech NuBone nut
  • 22 Medium jumbo frets
  • Pickup: 2x FT-5E FilterTron humbuckers
  • Volume control for neck pickup
  • Volume control for bridge pickup
  • Master volume control with treble bleed
  • Master tone control
  • Silver plexiglass pickguard with black Gretsch and Electromatic logos
  • Adjusto-Matic bridge with secured Laurel base
  • Bigsby B60
  • Open vintage style tuners
  • Nickel hardware
  • String gauge ex-works: .011 – .049
  • Colour: Orange Stain
